description:
Welcome to the private lives of Sasha Monet, and Viking. We invited them both to our set, being long time friends we asked that they play for a while as we filmed. The chemistry between them as friends is evident.
This 18-minute update is presented to you as extra weekend update, and is very different from our normal updates. This is what two friends who love bondage do when the doors are closed. Thanks Sasha and Viking for a sneak peek in.
title: Viking and Sasha Monet
